biotools.summary: RNN-IMP is a recurrent neural network based genotype imputation program implemented in Python. RNN-IMP takes phased genotypes in HAP/LEGEND format as input data and outputs imputation results in Oxford GEN format.

bioschemas.name: rnnimp
bioschemas.summary: RNN-IMP is a recurrent neural network based genotype imputation program implemented in Python. RNN-IMP takes phased genotypes in HAP/LEGEND format as input data and outputs imputation results in Oxford GEN format.
